laughing together while pointing at sky
resting head on shoulder during walk
scolding gently with hands on hips
brushing crumbs off clothes with soft smile
sitting together on park bench after school
waiting at gate with impatient smile
carrying school bag for other with ease
lying on floor doing homework together
feeding piece of lunch while smiling
hugging from side with old comfort
leaning on arm while dozing off
listening to music from same phone
brushing dust off face while laughing
calling out with bright smile from across street
drawing doodles on notebook while chatting
tugging scarf around both with shy grin
pressing hands against window waiting for arrival
staring up while resting chin on hands
pressing forehead playfully to check fever
biting lips before confessing with red face
hugging from behind with nostalgic smile
chasing with open arms after fight
cheering with small jump in schoolyard
resting on lap while snoring lightly
trying to braid hair with clumsy fingers
pointing at sky with childlike joy
waiting at swing set with soft eyes
patting head while looking away shyly
gently nudging with elbow during joke
picking flowers and handing over silently
rushing with open arms toward reunion
pulling hoodie hood over both heads
brushing off falling leaf from shoulder
waiting on stairs while humming softly
sleeping side by side on tatami mat
gifting candy with wink and grin
